name: Access to Medicine Foundation
goal: The Access to Medicine Foundation is an international not-for-profit organisation dedicated to addressing the challenges of access to medicine worldwide. Based in the Netherlands, the Foundation publishes the Access to Medicine Index, the first Index of its kind to rank pharmaceutical companies with respect to their efforts to improve global access to medicine. In doing so, we aim to improve access to medicine for people in need by encouraging the pharmaceutical industry to accept a greater role in facilitating access to medicine.
interests: Development, Enterprise, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Public Health, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Access to medicine, antimicrobial resistance, access to vaccines, CSR, sustainable development, research and development, global health
